title.native: Alan Hinkes: The First Briton To Climb The World's Highest Mountains

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Terry Abraham
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: An intimate and entertaining portrait of British mountaineering legend Alan Hinkes OBE, spanning Alan's life and career and created by acclaimed outdoor filmmaker and photographer Terry Abraham.
